title: March 1
description: Lucie's 7-month long contract ended this week. As if on cue, Milo got sick. As soon as he got better, Felix got sick. Once both kids were back in school, it was Lucie's turn to catch the bug and spend a day in bed. While it hasn't been a particularly fun week, Lucie did appreciate how considerate this virus has been in waiting until AFTER her work was wrapped up. Plus, we were all more of less back on our feet by the week-end.

children.title: Monster Mutt
children.description: We didn't take this photo but we did see this truck this week-end. We went to a Monster Truck Rally in Oakland. It was awesome and very very American.

children.title: Oakland Arena
children.description: The Oakland Arena.  The trucks spent more time in the air than on the ground.

children.title: The Girls
children.description:
Alexandra came for a visit from Germany. Supper at Tina's to celebrate.

From left to right: Clarence and baby Teddy, Tina, Keira and Alexandra.
